about_the_game:
The Timekeeper is the first title released by Symphonic Entertainment. You'll find yourself in "The Moment", a point in time and space, frozen at the collapse of an ancient civilization. It's your job to uncover the secrets of this collapse in order to leave a message that will save the future.

Players will be tasked with solving puzzles by matching colors and mastering platforming challenges throughout the world to unlock new areas and puzzles, progressing towards the final Keep. As the player progresses, they'll encounter new puzzle elements that will change the way they approach each sequence.

Players will be tasked with solving puzzles by matching colors and mastering platforming challenges throughout the world to unlock new areas and puzzles, progressing towards the final Keep. As the player progresses, they'll encounter new puzzle elements that will change the way they approach each sequence.
name: The Timekeeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit Only
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A third-person puzzle platformer set in a beautiful, engaging world. Players will learn how to carry and shift colors to solve puzzles.
